comments.body:
This was added in v0.8.0 https://nodejs.org/api/util.html#util_util_deprecate_fn_msg_code

Can you please make changes in other existing supported versions too?
* 10.x https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/aee73c479bd3f156b1468f3fd7e34811263f9e1a/types/node/v10/util.d.ts#L58
* 8.x https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/aee73c479bd3f156b1468f3fd7e34811263f9e1a/types/node/v8/base.d.ts#L5661
Using `?` and `| undefined` are redundant, just keep the `?`.
